## ðŸ”’ Paid Article (Oct. 15, 2025): Cathedrals of Freedom â€” Building What Endures

An extended meditation on what it means to build lasting systems in an age of collapse. the author draws parallels between medieval cathedral-building and modern open-source civilization, arguing that sovereignty, transparency, and truth are the enduring foundations of human freedom.

tags: ðŸ”’ Paid Article (Oct. 15, 2025): Cathedrals of Freedom â€” Building What Endures

An extended meditation on what it means to build lasting systems in an age of collapse. the author draws parallels between medieval cathedral-building and modern open-source civilization, arguing that sovereignty, transparency, and truth are the enduring foundations of human freedom.
